job.script: @echo off echo THIS IS THE JOB /shell-logon icacls %SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES% echo JOB-VARIABLE=JOB-VALUE >>%SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES% ping.exe 127.0.0.1 for /f "usebackq tokens=*" %%a in (`echo SELF-TEST`) do echo TEST-USERNAME=%%a for /f "usebackq tokens=*" %%a in (`%WinDir%\system32\whoami.exe`) do echo TEST-USERNAME=%%a rem whoami exits with error? exit 0
